title: Riven vs Vlad
body:
I couldn't really handle the lane as Riven. He had exhaust and I couldn't do anything but try to grab cs without dying. He seems really strong after the Buffs and the first time I played vs him I did really bad. This game I ended up winning 5/2 but it's probably only because they had 3 AP and I just built Hedrinker -> Edge Of Night / Mercury Boots -> Cleaver to survive. With less MR I'm pretty sure he could have just dove me. So how am I supposed to play this lane? Or is it a matchup like Jayce and Riven is supposed to lose it and it's fine if she just survives?

Maybe I shouldn't go Lethality Runes/Thunderlords vs him so I can go aggresive early on? But the Setup helped us out a lot and got us 3 kills as we were about to get really behind so I don't know...

Fun Fact: I had so much MR that he did about 46% of the damage with AA to me as I tried to all in him but ended up dying.
